title: Inventors of thingumajigs
creator_credit: Raymond Garceau, Paul Larose and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: This beautiful, humorous and mad film introduces us to a very special breed of people whose rarefied ideas suffer occasional setbacks. Whatever the invention - comb-cleaner, panty-hose, snowmobile - these “inventors of thingumajigs” are a valuable natural resource who contribute much to society.
